sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Button, Row, Col, ListGroup, Image, Card } from 'react-bootstrap' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import Message from '../Message' import CheckoutSteps from '../CheckoutSteps' const PlaceOrderScreen = () => { const cart = useSelector((state) => state.cart) const placeOrderHandler = () => { dispatch( createOrder({ orderItems: cart.cartItems, shippingAddress: cart.shippingAddress, paymentMethod: cart.paymentMethod, itemsPrice: cart.itemsPrice, shippingPrice: cart.shippingPrice, taxPrice: cart.taxPrice, totalPrice: cart.totalPrice, }) ) } return ( <>

Shipping

Address: {cart.shippingAddress.address}, {cart.shippingAddress.postCode},{' '} {cart.shippingAddress.country}

Payment Method

Method: {cart.paymentMethod}

Order Items

{cart.cartItems.length === 0 ? ( Your cart is empty ) : ( {cart.cartItems.map((item, index) => ( {item.name} {item.price} £{' '}

Qty: {item.qty}

Total: {item.qty * item.price} £

))} )}

Order Summery

 Items £ {cart.itemsPrice} Shipping £ {cart.itemsPrice} Tax £ {cart.itemsPrice} Total £ {cart.itemsPrice} ) } export default PlaceOrderScreen
